input.sentences: i was looking up a recipe and i decided to try to make some dim sum .
i bought all of the ingredients and began the process .
it took me a long time to make a single one .
afterward i cooked them and put them in the oven to stay warm .
when all my friends showed up i served them all some great food .
output.sentences: The book had the recipe and instructions.
He prepped all of the ingredients.
After prepping them, it was time to put it all together.
After they were stuffed, into the oven they went.
His friends came over and they enjoyed over dinner and conversation.
